title: Challenger Ahri's orb no longer has dark shades surrounding it
body: After taking a break from my main Ahri{{champion:103}} , I started playing her again using my favorite skin of hers which is Challenger Ahri. I noticed that her orb doesn't have the dark shades in it anymore and is instead all blue. Also her orb on the challenger skin looks quite smaller than the orbs for her other skins. I'm not sure how to include a screenshot lol, but If anybody else noticed this please feel free to post any pictures about it because I don't know how

replies.body: Eeep! Nice catch! I'll follow up with the team today and see what's going on. It's likely this won't be resolved for next patch, but I'll see if we can get it in for the following patch. :)
2 patches just to fix her orbs default animation? You guys must have a TON going on.
It's not that - we're already packaging the Kled/SKT patch, which means any fixes we make today or early next week, wouldn't be in patch 6.16. :)

Oh gotcha, thanks for clearing that up. It didn't seem like too much of an issue to fix so I got confused at the amount of time said. Thanks for replying, I love ahri and her dark evil feel is just that much better. Cleared up my confusion too. {{champion:103}}

Totally agree - it's certainly a small fix! :)

As you may have seen, Arcade Ahri is going to be hitting PBE with the next cycle. Since we're already working with Ahri, we're looking to prioritize this particle issue for 6.17. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=X5simOFv,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-07T02:23:26.054+0000)

do you know who made the Arcade Ahri splash?
I believe it was Alex Flores. :)
Definitely buying arcade ahri! Looks absolutely amazing from what was teased. Plus I have to keep my record going of owning all the queens skins. Jade princess ahri tho... Amazing concept
thanks guys i thought i was the only one seeing this XD

I was able to create this for you. https://s31.postimg.org/618ygc70b/Ahri_collage_for_bug.jpg

It shows all skills, and taunt, auto attack, and normally standing there. The orb for me is also not darkened but I have no issues with other skins.
Uh, I changed my name, I dunno if this is gonna ruin the thread or make people confused lol
